name: Underground Conduits ITP001
Preparation
Check clear of other services (The Clearance for gas pipes is 300mm & other services 100mm)
Check cable size to verify conduit size & determine size of trench
Organise barricades, webbing, plates, warning lights (if applicable prior to excavation) - please take a photo
Determine spoil removal, backfill material, compaction, cable marking protection & installment requirements
Installation
Confirm area of work is accessible & acceptable to commence (If not comment below)
Setout & alignment as per drawing (include revision below)
Drawing & revision number(s)
Mark out trench route - Arrange saw cutting if required
Excavate trench & install barricades as required - please take a photo
Determine which way cable will be installed & lay coupling in no friction direction, install conduit glue.
Install draw wire if required
Inspect trench by supply authority if applicable
Inspect & backfill trench
Reinstate & clean area
Install direction marker if applicable
Mark up DGR for future as builts
FINAL - Pass when happy to proceed with work(s) (Any issues please comment below)
Main Switchboard & Termination of Cables ITP002
template name: Main Switchboard & Termination of Cables ITP002

name: Preparation
Locate & fix switchboard into position - check for clearances fix correctly
Determine cable sizes for cable glands & mark out gland plate (check cable O.D's for cable size glands)
Install cable glands & cables
Install lugs & terminate
Clean & vacuum out board - please take a photo
Check all circuits are terminated & safe at the other end or disconnect
Final visual inspection of board - please take a photo
Installation
Test earth continuity & resistance
Test insulation resistance
Test polarity
Test phase rotation
Attach prescribed certificate of electrical safety. Organise inspection by inspector (Add photo or attached certification
Isolate / lock off/ dange tag all outgoing circuits - please take a photo
Ensure labelling is complete & accurate
Energise system
Check phase rotation
Check switchboard as installed as per drawings
Drawing & revision number(s)
Ensure any modifications to shop drawings are matched to existing & returned to office / attach drawings
Ensure switch room is left clean - please take a photo
FINAL - Pass when happy to proceed with work(s) (Any issues please comment below)
Mains, Sub Mains Cable in Conduits or on Trays ITP004
template name: Mains, Sub Mains Cable in Conduits or on Trays ITP004

name: Measure cable runs with appropriate accurate measuring instrument (eg tape measure, wheel)
Check cable sizes resistance of protective earth conductor - shall be low enough to permit passage of current necessary to operate protective device
Confirm length of cable if sub contract item & order
Record length of cable

Install cable in appliance method (EG. Cable stands, electric winch, pulleys etc.) - ANY CABLE NOT TERMINATED IMMEDIATELY MUST HAVE
THE ENDS TAPED COVERING THE BARE COPPER - please take a photo
Trefoil cables & tie cables to support system (ensure spacing)
Check requirements for cable identification & install
FINAL - Pass when happy to proceed with work(s) (Any issues please comment below)
Install Distribution Boards -Terminate Cables ITP006
Check delivery of distribution board - Check for damage (paint finish, dimensions & door against drawing) - Please take a photo
Locate & fix into position
Install sub mains cabling as appropriate (glands, tray & duct)
Install lugs & terminate
Install sub circuit & terminate (if circuit not complete at the other end, it must not be terminated)
Clean & vacuum area - please take a photo
Record results
Clearly identify services
Energise system
Check phase rotation
Check switchboard as installed as per drawings
Drawing & revision number(s)
Check typed schedule for accuracy & install
Ensure switchboard cupboard & area is left clean - Please take a photo
FINAL - Pass when happy to proceed with work(s) (Any issues please comment below)
ITP003 Conduit & Cable Tray form
Check delivery for damage & correct quantity
Ensure locations of lights is coordinated with other trades
Refer to reflected ceiling plan for set out
Plug in or fit off light
Fit off data capable (if applicable)
Install light fighting
Install lamp & diffuser & clean fitting
FINAL - Pass when happy to proceed with work(s) (Any issues please comment below)
Switchboard Delivery ITP013
Prior to delivery, visual inspection to coordinate delivery on site - please take a photo if delivery is unable to be completed
Review & determine method of unloading (eg. Crane, forklift, man power, specialist subcontractor. Arrange & upload all necessary documentation
Coordinate time of delivery - take photo of delivery docket
Check delivery for damage & correct quantity
Safely position delivery into place (eg. crane, forklift, rollers, manual, specialist subcontractor
If Ergo Group are positioning main switchboard maneuvering kit is to be delivered with main switchboard.
Distributions boards require a lifting trolley
FINAL - Pass when happy to proceed with work(s) (Any issues please comment below)

Installation of lighting cabling and fit off
template name: Installation of lighting cabling and fit off

name: Rough In
Confirm that the cable support system has been completed as per documentation
Electrical cables have been appropriately sized & selected to ensure that they will support currently installed & future equipment
Mechanical protection has been provided to minimise the likelihood of physical damage to cabling
Cabling has been concealed where possible in ceiling spaces, wall cavities or risers
All lights have been wired as per drawings
All lights & switches have been marked on the site as built drawings
Height & location have been confirmed for each switch
Lighting control system has been confirmed (DALI /2 40v)
Fit Off & Commission
Equipment/materials have been selected and installed as per drawings/specifications
Ceiling supports have been installed where required (ceiling fans / pendants
Terminations have been checked & all terminations are correct & secure in all outlets
Switches have all been secured in place & levelled
All lights are sitting flush & / or been levelled
All cablings has been tested for insulations resistance & continuity
Each circuit is terminated at the DB & protected by the correct protection device
Each switch has been labelled
Functional test carried out on each switch & light
Each circuit has been marked on the site as build's
FINAL - Pass when happy to proceed with work(s) (Any issues please comment below)

name: Rough In
Confirm that the cable support system has been completed as per documentation
Data cabling has been selected as per drawings and specifications (Cat6/CatA & brand)
Mechanical protection has been provided to minimise the likelihood of physical damage to cabling
Cabling has been concealed where possible in ceiling spaces, wall cavities or risers

Fit Off & Commission

Each cable has been correctly installed and terminated in the patch panel
Each outlet has been labelled
Each outlet marked on the site as build’s
